    • Method Detail

      • createPolicies

        public CompletableFuture<Optional<org.apache.pulsar.common.policies.data.LocalPolicies>> createPolicies(String path,
                                                                                                        boolean readFromGlobal)
        Create LocalPolicies with bundle-data in LocalZookeeper by fetching it from GlobalZookeeper
        Parameters:
        path - znode path
        readFromGlobal - if true copy policies from global zk to local zk else create a new znode with empty Policies
        Throws:
        Exception
